member.name: T:Arc.Infrastructure.Presentation.Mvp.MasterPage`1
member.summary: Base class for master pages. For registering event handlers its best to use HookupEventhandlers method.
member.remarks: For using it, presenter should have constructor parameter named "view" and MasterPage must be implementing that interface.

member.name: M:Arc.Infrastructure.Presentation.Mvp.MasterPage`1.OnInit(System.EventArgs)
member.param: An object that contains the event data.

member.name: T:Arc.Infrastructure.Presentation.Mvp.Page`1
member.summary: Base class for pages. For registering event handlers its best to use HookupEventhandlers method.
member.remarks: For using it, presenter should have constructor parameter named "view" and Page must be implementing that interface.

member.name: M:Arc.Infrastructure.Presentation.Mvp.Page`1.OnInit(System.EventArgs)
member.param: An object that contains the event data.

member.name: T:Arc.Infrastructure.Presentation.Mvp.UserControl`1
member.summary: Base class for user controls. For registering event handlers its best to use HookupEventhandlers method.
member.remarks: For using it, presenter should have constructor parameter named "view" and UserControl must be implementing that interface.

member.name: M:Arc.Infrastructure.Presentation.Mvp.UserControl`1.OnInit(System.EventArgs)
